name: Character_Expert
content:
Character Expert was a Aki-Aki found at the Festival of the Ancestors. They were the expert of the characters in the story "The Rise and Fall of Panakin Slytalker" which was about a Jedi Knight named Bye-Gon Jim who met a young Panakin Slytalker.
"Character Expert" first appeared in a mission titled "Festival of the Ancestors" in the 2022 non-canonical video game LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga.
